Reviews.Title: Excellent service; some questions re the choice of items in the package
Reviews.Author: A. Cronin
Reviews.Content: I think this is an excellent choice in many ways.I did have a question re appropriate filters and sunshades for the various lenses. Only one lens was accommodated with these essentials as part of the package.Circuit City added a sunshade and filter set for another lens; this should be part of the package.I also found that receiving only one disk to put pictures on was limiting.  I always use 2 (one for RAW and one for JPG) but like to have an extra two on hand.  I will order extra cards to fill that gap.The product is excellent.Circuit City went out of their way to be accommodating - courteous and professional.
